text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
What does your fan service for your 
Winning Lives look like, Curren?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Umm, I haven't really decided. 
Maybe I should think about it properly.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Let's do it now then! 
Falko will give you advice☆

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Wah, are you sure? 
Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Well then, I'll try my usual.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Like that… 
Is it not different enough?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I-I think you should just go with that…!
The tone of voice, the angle of the
pose, everything is perfect☆

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Wahh, I'm so happy to hear that! 
Got Falko's seal of approval♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
… How can she be so casually 
perfect… What's up with her…!
